title: SDF_VERSION need to distinguish between protocol version and pkg version.

content.raw:
Since the 2.0.0 prerelease, the package version and the protocol version are not the same any more. Currently, the package is exporting SDF_VERSION in <sdf/config.h> using the version defined in root CMakeLists.txt which is also used for the package version.

We need to split into two different variables, one for pkg version (used by cpack) and another one which represent the protocol version.

To keep backwards compatibility, SDF_VERSION should be used to represent the protocol version, so the proposal would to create a SDF_PKG_MAJOR_VERSION, SDF_PKG_MINOR_VERSION, ... which will be used to create the package version.
